question: My uncle has died living a property of 10 million. He has 3 wifes 10 daughters 10 sons and his parents. Please show how much each one will get.
answer:

ANSWER

At the outset, it must be pointed out that the heirs of an Estate may only be determined upon one's demise. According to the Islamic Law of Succession and Inheritance, distribution of an Estate will only commence after funeral expenses, debts (including legal costs) and bequests (if any) made to non-heirs - which will not exceed one-third (1/3) of the Estate after debts and funeral expenses - have been settled. Thereafter, all assets form part of the Nett Estate and will have to be distributed according to the Islamic Law of Succession and Inheritance. The nett Estate will be divided into seven hundred and twenty (720) equal shares and distributed as follows: Each wife receives : 30 shares Each daughter receives : 13 shares Each son receives : 26 shares Father receives : 120 shares Mother receives : 120 shares and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best Mufti Ebrahim Desai FATWA DEPT.
